articles.author: Mia Sato
articles.title: New EU regulations target Shein's counterfeit fashion problem - The Verge
articles.description: Shein has been designated a “very large online platform” by the EU. The designation will require more transparency and controls around illegal products on the site.
articles.content:

articles.author: Eric Mutter
articles.title: Bully Ray & Tommy Dreamer Discuss FTC Ruling Banning Non-Compete Clauses - Wrestling Inc.
articles.description: Bully Ray and Tommy Dreamer discuss the potential ramifications for free agency after the FTC ruled to ban certain non-compete clauses earlier this week
articles.content: A ruling by the FTC earlier this week regarding the end of certain non-compete clauses raised eyebrows in pro wrestling, with some wondering if this could bring about the end of the vaunted 90-day no… [+1571 chars]
